MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.18am. We have unconfirmed reports of 3rd party damage to our equipment and we suspect that your property is affected by this. Our next available engineer will attend site to confirm this report and our team will work to get your power supply back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.25am on the 16th of November 2020.
